seo.title: Garmin Xero® A1i PRO | Digital Bow Sight
seo.ogDescription: Xero® A1i PRO Bow Sight features fast and easy setup, auto-ranging, and line of sight feedback to take your best shot every time.

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• Xero A1i PRO bow sight (right- or left-handed depending on version selected)
  • Mount
  • Protective bag
  • 2 AAA Lithium batteries
  • 3 Allen hex keys
  • 2 screws
  • Grip tape
  • micro USB cable
  • Documentation

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
General
Dimension233.8 x 127.2 x 94.7 mm (9.2″ x 5.0″ x 3.7″) (includes device and mount)
Weight510.3 g (18 oz)
Water rating IPX7
Display TypeSunlight-visible, transflective memory-in-pixel (MIP)
Display Size2.5 x 1.1 cm (1"W x 0.42"H); 5 cm (2") diag
Display Resolution160 x 68 pixels
Battery type2 lithium AAA (included)
Battery lifeUp to 1 year
Operating range-20° C (-4° F) to 60° C (140° F) with two AAA lithium batteries
Laser classificationClass 1

Sensors
GPS
Compass

Scope Features
Coloured pins2 colours (red and green)
Pin diameter.007″ and larger for red, .009″ and larger for green
Ranging distance90m to game, 275m to reflective targets
Glass lens coatingTarget side is anti-reflective, water repellant and easy clean archer side is 20% reflective, water repellant and easy clean
Light projectionNo visible light is ever projected toward the target
Pin brightnessAmbient light sensor controlled or manual
Silent Button Trigger
Shot counter
Customisable fixed pins
Laser Locate™ feature
Multiple Arrow Profiles
Shot dynamics
Compatible with Garmin GPS devices
Microadjustable rails
Quick-detach feature
Auto calibration
Dynamic level
Flight pin
Xtra Distance (XD) mode
Electronic level
Angle compensated distance
Auto brightness

Additional
AdditionalLED pins: 2 colours (red and green)
Pin diameters = 0.007″ and larger for red, 0.009″ and larger for green
Range: 90 metres to game; 275 metres to reflective targets
Operating range: -20°C (-4°F) to 60°C (140°F)
Glass lens coating: target side is anti-reflective, water repellent and easy clean; archer side is 20% reflective, water repellent and easy clean
Light projection: no visible light is ever projected toward the target
Magnification: none
Pin brightness: ambient light sensor controlled or manual
Silent Button Trigger
Microadjustable rails
Quick-detach feature
Auto-calibration
Dynamic level
Flight Apex:
Xtra Distance (XD) mode
Customisable fixed pins
Laser Locate™ feature
Multiple Arrow Profiles
Shot dynamics

Compatible with Garmin GPS devices: see Compatible Devices tab

productEmsList.tooltip:
A1i: Adds advanced features, such as dual-color LED pins, multiple arrow profiles and Laser Locate™ functionality

A1i PRO: Adds advanced features, such as dual-color LED pins, multiple arrow profiles and Laser Locate™ functionality, plus adds micro-adjustable rails and quick detach for travel

A1i PRO - Hoyt®: Adds Hoyt picatinny mount adapter in addition to standard mounting hardware
